item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
In the caves of the God Mountain, cultic assassins are trained by the Black Sorcerers. The Spider Warrior is not yet a fully trained assassin, but is skilled in stealth and melee combat. Spider Warriors wear black plate armor that mimics their totemic animal and wield sword and dagger.
